DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal project determine genetic factor contribute interindividual difference response beta-blockade .
DOC.detailed_description: The Aim define contribution genetic variation interindividual variability response β-blockade . The rationale study follow : Beta-blockers prevent activation β-ARs thus form cornerstone treatment pathological state congestive heart failure coronary artery disease . Functional polymorphisms cardiac beta-receptors show determine response β-blocker therapy . A physiologic stimulus exercise cause sympathetic stimulation activation cardiac β-ARs genotypic difference response β-blockers magnify state heighten sympathetic activity . Thus , addition measure response β-blockers rest , also determine response β-blockade sub-maximal exercise supine bicycle ergometer . Genetic variation may alter sensitivity beta blocker seek .
DOC.criteria: Subject must willing give write informed consent able adhere diet study schedule . Subjects must free clinically significant disease require physician 's care and/or would interfere study evaluation . Subjects must clinically acceptable physical examination ECG . Laboratory test ( CBC , blood chemistry , urinalysis ) must within clinically acceptable limit . Any subject take prescription overthecounter drug , oral contraception female , within one week prior study drug administration . Subjects presently , formerly , narcotic addict alcoholic . Active smoker . Subjects clinically significant allergy/intolerance atenolol . Females positive serum/urine pregnancy test screening . Females nurse . Subjects complete heart block/ significant cardiovascular disease . Subjects history asthma symptom medication within last 10 year . Subjects systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure < 50 mm Hg heart rate < 50/min screen visit baseline pre drug value study day .
